page.description: Is the current dde link valid.
page.discussion: The .IS_VALID() method returns .T. (TRUE) if the connection has been established; otherwise, it returns .F. (FALSE).
page.example: sys_shell("C:\Program Files\Microsoft Office\Office10\WINWORD.EXE") dde_session = dde.open("winword", "system") ? dde_session.is_valid() = .T.
